wtsproc.config: Vehicle is equipped with air conditioning

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect battery.
Remove ash tray. Remove ash tray mounting bracket.
Remove upper left hand dash panel.
Remove lower right hand dash panel with air conditioning drain pan attached.
Remove upper right hand dash panel.
Remove relay panel from dash frame. Lay panel aside for access.
Remove cover plate from air conditioning/heater box.
Using suitable pliers, pinch heater hoses.
Disconnect heater hoses at heater core. Catch coolant in container.

note.para: Rear rivet retaining heater core assembly at cowl area is not removed. It is only a guide to secure the core at the rear.

step1.para: Remove screws retaining heater core.
Remove heater core.

note.para: It may be necessary to adjust temperature control knob to move blend air door for access to remove core.

step1.para: Clean coolant from air conditioning/heater box area.
Transfer heater core seals.
Install heater core.
Connect heater hoses to heater core.
Remove pliers from heater hoses.
Add coolant as needed to obtain proper coolant level.
Check for coolant leaks.
Install cover plate to air conditioning/heater box.
Install relay panel.
Install upper right hand dash panel.
Install air conditioning drain pan tube in opening at cowl area. Install lower right hand panel.
Install upper left hand dash panel.
Install ash tray mounting bracket. Install ash tray.
Connect battery.
Remove wheel chocks.
